article_title: Top Ten Cases (And Rulings) Of 2015: #3: Notice 2015-17 Relieves Employers Of Huge Penalties

article_metadata.author: Tony Nitti

og.description: It’s finally over. The October 15th tax deadline is behind us, which means tax practitioners have mercifully finished their filings for the year. Unless of course, you chose to make your career in the not-for-profit world, in which case you deserve the extra month of misery. On October 19th, thousands of tax advisors simultaneously [...]
